title: The Lazy Song
lyrics:
[chorus]
To-(C)day I don't feel (G)like doing a-(F)nything
(C)I just wanna (G)lay in my be-(F)ed
Don't (C)feel like picking (G)up my phone
So (F)leave a message at the tone
Cause to-(C)day I swear I'm (E7)not doing a-(F)nything
 
Uh I'm gonna (C)kick my feet up and (G)stare at the fan
(F)Turn the TV on, throw my hand in my pants
(C)Nobody's gonna (G)tell me I can't, (F) nah
I'll be (C)lying on the couch just (G)chillin in my snuggie
(F)Click to MTV so they can teach me how to dougie
Cause (C)in my castle (G)I'm the freakin (F) man
 
[pre-chorus]
Oh oh (Dm)yes I said it
(Em) I said it
I (F)said it cause I (G)can
 
[chorus]
To-(C)day I don't feel (G)like doing a-(F)nything
(C)I just wanna (G)lay in my be-(F)ed
Don't (C)feel like picking (G)up my phone
So (F)leave a message at the tone
Cause to-(C)day I swear I'm (E7)not doing a-(F)nything
(F-stop)Nothing at all
(C) Woo hoo ooh (G) woo hoo ooh
(F) Hoo ooh ooh… Nothing at all
(C) Woo hoo ooh (G) woo hoo ooh
(F) Hoo ooh ooh
 
Tomorrow (C)I wake up do some (G)P90X
Meet a (F)really nice girl have some really nice sex
And (C)she's gonna scream (G)out this is gre-(F)eat
 
I (C)might mess around and get my (G)college degree
I (F)bet my old man will be so proud of me
I'm (C)sorry pops you (G)just have to wa-(F)ait
 
[pre-chorus]
Oh oh (Dm)yes I said it
(Em) I said it
I (F)said it cause I (G)can
 
[chorus]
To-(C)day I don't feel (G)like doing a-(F)nything
(C)I just wanna (G)lay in my be-(F)ed
Don't (C)feel like picking (G)up my phone
So (F)leave a message at the tone
Cause to-(C)day I swear I'm (E7)not doing a-(F)nything
 
[bridge]
No I (Dm)ain't gonna comb my (G)hair
Cause (F)I ain't going any(G)where
(F)No no no no (Em)no no-no no-no (C)no
I'll just (Dm)strut in my birthday (G)suit
And let (F)everything hang (G)loose
(F)Yeah yeah yeah yeah (Em)yeah yeah-yeah yeah-yeah (C)yeahhh

To-(C)day I don't feel (G)like doing a-(F)nything
